text: Petr Veselý (born 7 June 1971) is a former Czech football player. Veselý played mostly for Baník Ostrava and Petra Drnovice in the Gambrinus liga. He also represented the Czech Republic twice at the international level. ==External links== * Category:1971 births Category:Living people Category:Czech footballers Category:Czech Republic international footballers Category:Czech First League players Category:FC Baník Ostrava players Category:FC Hradec Králové players Category:ŠK Slovan Bratislava players Category:People from Přerov Category:FK Drnovice players Category:Patraikos F.C. players Category:Czech expatriate footballers Category:Expatriate footballers in Greece Category:Czech expatriate sportspeople in Greece Category:Association football defenders
title: Petr Veselý (footballer)
